message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $13500. This represents a significant savings compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I trust that you will find the product to be well worth the investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. Looking forward to your positive response.
